userreviews.userReview: Somebody actually donated this to the library. I’m not sure whether to be amused at their sense of humor or appalled at their audacity. I think I’ll pass it along to my best friend.
what? i got it as a christmas present "because i know you like sex and i know you like cookies."
Best sexy cookie book ever!Informative and hilarious with just enough adorable to keep me reading all the way to the ending recipe. A fun read!
This book is hilarious and makes me want to bake sexy cookies!
If you do not alread know here is a good one for you.
charming and funny. It would be fun to bake some cookies like this.
Informative and adorable- Who has the job of illustrating this book?! It's hilarious. T'was an excellent Christmas present.
most likely the best present I got for Christmas. It is so funny and I love the cookie illustrations. Really funny.
An excellent study in taking a joke and running it as deeply into the ground as you can.
Seriously adorable. Seriously genius. Seriously educational. Gingerbread cookies in sexual positions... But, really, I learned things!!!!!....
Just too cute. So many baking references! So risque! Only they're cookies!
'For the bakers... Especially for the bakers...'
I may never be able to close my eyes again.
Given my sabbatical from reading in 2013, I needed something to ease my way back into it so this is what I read. Lol. It was hilarious - thanks Chia-Yu!

description: Birds do it, bees do it. And guess what—cookies do it, too. In fact, never have a pair of gingerbread cookies looked so pleased. Yes, the Kama Sutra meets the Joy of Cooking. Featuring an unabashed gingerbread couple, who are photographed in unflinching full color, the Cookie Sutra is a recipe for pleasure. There is The First Posture, where two are yoked as one (yet the calorie count remains unchanged). The Pair of Tongs, allowing the woman to be open, free, sweet and crunchy. Pounding the Spot, requiring the suppleness of freshly rolled dough. There is Scissors, Autumn Dog, Tripod, The Wheelbarrow, The Snake Trap. And, for the advanced and adventurous, The Suspended Congress—great care must be taken lest the cookies crumble.
title: The Cookie Sutra: An Ancient Treatise: that Love Shall Never Grow Stale. Nor Crumble.
